branchCategory.name: Vacuum Switches
branchCategory.description: <p>Vacuum Switches provide a completely integrated, digital solution designed to monitor vacuum status. Vacuum sensor and switch outputs are integrated into ultra-compact, lightweight units. Easy push  button calibration eliminates the need for tools. Available in either easy-to-read LCD with backlit or LED readouts which display current measured value as well as set points and output mode information. Vacuum  sensor switch outputs are digital NPN or PNP and analog, with simple programming and multiple application features such as failure prediction and window comparator. Vacuum sensor switches can be integrated  directly onto many vacuum generators.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE10
branchItem.description: <p>ZSE10 compact, digital pressure switch for vacuum/compound pressure has been reduced in height by approximately 50% when compared to the ZSE30A.&nbsp; Up to 10&nbsp;remote sensors can be set at once using the copy settings function.&nbsp; Options include&nbsp;direct mount, panel mount&nbsp;or DIN rail mount, and a choice of 2 piping directions.&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE20(F)
branchItem.description: <p>The ZSE20(F) series is a high-precision digital pressure switch offering a simplified selection of the most popular ZSE features. This is the first ZSE model to introduce the 3 screen, 3-color display. The main screen shows the current measured value in red or green, while two sub-screens can display the setting label and its numeric value in orange. ZSE20 is vacuum rated, while the ZSE20F is rated for vacuum and a low positive pressure range. These models require the lowest current consumption in the ZSE family, at 25mA. Futher, delay time between the arrival of the set pressure value and the switch output is minimized to 2.5ms. ZSE20(F) is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE20A(F)
branchItem.description: <p>The ZSE20A(F) series is a high-precision digital pressure switch offering many popular ZSE features, with a streamlined selection of piping choices.&nbsp; Compared to the ZSE20, the ZSE20AF adds a 2nd switch output, as well as an analog output, either voltage or current.&nbsp; ZSE20A is vacuum rated, while the ZSE20AF is rated for vacuum and a low positive pressure range.&nbsp; Each model in the ZSE20 family offers a 2-screen, 3-color display.&nbsp; The main screen shows the current measured numeric value in orange.&nbsp; Delay time for the switch ouput can be as brief as 1.5 ms, while currect consumption is held to 35 mA of less. ZSE20A(F) is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE20B(F)
branchItem.description: <p>The ZSE20B(F) series is a high-precision digital pressure switch offering many popular ZSE features, with a streamlined selection of piping choices.&nbsp; Compared to the ZSE20, the ZSE20B(F) adds a 2nd switch output, as well as an analog output, either voltage or current.&nbsp; The ZSE20B(F) also has an IP65 protection rating, compared to the ZSE20A's IP40.&nbsp; ZSE20B is vacuum rated, while the ZSE20BF is rated for both vacuum and a low positive pressure range.&nbsp; Each model in the ZSE20 family offers a 3-screen, 3-color display.&nbsp; The main screen shows the curent measured value in red or green, while two sub-screens can display the setting label and its numeric value in orange.&nbsp; Delay time for the switch output can be as brief as 1.5 ms, while current consumption is held to 35 mA or less. ZSE20B(F) is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE20C(F)
branchItem.description: <p>The ZSE20C(F) series is a high-precision digital pressure switch offering compatibility with both compressed air and non corrosive liquids.&nbsp; Compared to the ZSE20, the ZSE20C(F) adds a 2nd switch output, as well as an analog output, either voltage or current.&nbsp; The ZSE20C(F) also has an IP65 protection rating, compared to the ZSE20's IP40.&nbsp; ZSE20C is vacuum rated, while the ZSE20CF is rated for both vacuum and a low positive pressure range.&nbsp; Each model in the ZSE20 family offers a 3-screen, 3-color display.&nbsp; The main screen shows the curent measured value in red or green, while two sub-screens can display the setting label and its numeric value in orange.&nbsp; Delay time for the switch output can be as brief as 1.5 ms, while current consumption is held to 35 mA or less. ZSE20C(F) is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE30A
ZSE40A
branchItem.description: <p>The ZSE40A(F) series is a high precision digital pressure switch, providing improved functions, performance and variations over the previous ISE40 series.&nbsp; Abnormal values can be seen at a glance on the 2-color display.&nbsp; The settings of the&nbsp;base&nbsp;pressure switch can be copied to up to 10&nbsp;remote pressure switches, reducing the setting work, and preventing mistakes in setting.&nbsp; Other features include: simple 3-step setting, analog output, wide variety of piping variations, and a power-saving function for MPa-kPa.&nbsp; The ZSE40A(F) is also CE, UL/CSA and RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE80
branchItem.description: The ZSE80 series is a digital pressure switch designed to measure fluids such as tap water, hydraulic fluid, silicon oil, lubricant, fluorocarbon, argon, ammonia, carbon dioxide, air-containing drainage and nitrogen.&nbsp; Some of the features include 2-color indication, select from back piping and bottom piping, the addition of 2MPa and -101kPa types, also low leakage type, water hammer protection, easy operation, and standardization of CE, UL/CSA and RoHS compliance.&nbsp;

branchItem.name: ZSE1
ZSE2
ZSE3
ZSM1
